description: Contains sales order header information including customer, dates, and order status.

columns.name: OrderID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each sales order.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Customers identifying who placed the order.

columns.name: SalespersonPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the salesperson who handled the order.

columns.name: PickedByPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the warehouse staff who picked the order.

columns.name: ContactPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the customer contact for this order.

columns.name: BackorderOrderID
columns.description: Reference to original order if this is a backorder.

columns.name: OrderDate
columns.description: Date when the order was placed.

columns.name: CustomerPurchaseOrderNumber
columns.description: Customer's own purchase order reference number.

columns.name: IsUndersupplyBackordered
columns.description: Indicates if undersupplied items should be backordered.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Additional comments or notes about the order.

columns.name: InternalComments
columns.description: Internal notes not visible to customer.

columns.name: PickingCompletedWhen
columns.description: Timestamp when warehouse picking was completed.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
